en.registered:
This is a message from Dorcas Ukraine.

We have received your application for support.

label.en: Please, select the option which better describes the current situation of your household
We are currently residing in a conflict affected area
We have been displaced by the current conflict and we settled somewhere else in the same country
We have been displaced by the current conflict and we are on the move
We were displaced by a previous conflict, not the current one
We are hosting someone who was displaced by the current conflict
What oblast is your home location in?
What raion is your home location in?
Where your household is residing now?
We are displaced in another location
Please, can you give us your phone number?
What is your patronymic name? (i.e. the part of your name based on your father's name)
What is your date of birth?
What type of document do you have as identification?
If you selected 'Other', please let us know what kind of document do you have. (Otherwise you can just write 'NA')
Please, indicate your document number (If you selected 'Missing documentation', you can just write 'NA')
Please, indicate your tax number (INN) (if you don't have it, write 'NA')
Do you have any chronic illness or serious medical condition?
Do you have any physical or mental disability?
If you are a woman, are you pregnant or lactating?
If you have a bank card number, please indicate it. (Otherwise you can just write 'NA')
